title: SMNTY Classics: Abolitionist Heroines
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Abolitionist Heroines
description:
In this classic episode, Cristen and Caroline discuss the often unsung women who helped set an enslaved people free, despite tremendous race- and gender-based prejudice.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
